alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 8:42PM CDT until May 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain above flood stage through Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 24.4 Tue 8 PM 24.4 24.3 24.2 slow fall &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
